website_summaries.verdict: A highly rated garden rake recognized for its locking switch and durability.
pros: Length can extend from 32 to 62 inches
Rake head is adjustable from 7 1/2 inches to nearly 20 inches
Buyers rave over its lightweight design and superb portability
cons: Some customers wished it was heavier for stability

website_summaries.verdict: A sound choice for most consumers, thanks in part to the adjustable tines and handle. However, there are a few durability and functionality concerns.
cons: Handle locking button has been reported to stick
Feels a bit top-heavy when raking

customer_reviews.title: Cool item, Convent sizing and seems well made.
customer_reviews.text: This item is so cool. I love that it’s compact and the rake can have an adjustable width. Easy to use too. I’ll be using this on camping trips to clear leaves, sticks and rocks from where I’m putting the tent. I’ll be using this product this weekend so will up date review if it’s needed but as of now I love it and it seems really well made!!
customer_reviews.author: Uriel R.

customer_reviews.title: Cool rake! Wish I knew about this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Cool rake! Wish I knew about this sooner. I have over 150 hostas in my garden and the narrow setting gets in between the plants with no problem. I'm a senior with bad knees so this makes life so much easier. Be sure to push the button in to extend the telescopic handle otherwise you will have a really short rake. Very sturdy and well-made. Great investment. This would make a great gift for a gardener too.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Unfortuante
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to use this and store it in my tiny house because it's a cool telescoping rake but when I opened it from the box a metal piece hit the floor immediately and I could never figure out what it went to to fix it or use the rake. It was obviously an important part as the rake blades started to fall apart and out of the rake handle. Returned for a refund. Seems like hit or miss from the reviews. Maybe different supplier issues?
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good rake head, horrible handle
customer_reviews.text: The shaft of this product bent after one use. I have three oak trees in my backyard so I do get a ton of leaves. The rake head itself is nice but would need to be mounted to something sturdier
customer_reviews.author: warren hooper

customer_reviews.title: Clever design
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made little telescoping rake. You can adjust it from a stubby couple of feet to almost full-sized 60". I use it in the short configuration to sweep yard debris into a shovel. You can adjust the width of the tines by sliding and locking the lever, which makes it perfect for my use. The rake fully extended does feel a bit wobbly due to the telescoping adjustment, but it should stand up to normal raking. Very clever design overall.
customer_reviews.author: robosolo

customer_reviews.title: Sharp handle, very hard to adjust, HEAVY! Not for older gardeners
customer_reviews.text: I would for sure return this if there wasn't a shipping fee back. Might anyway. The lever to adjust the rake is hard to maneuver/slide up and down. The handle/grip has a very sharp ridge that is dangerous and uncomfortable and it is difficult to depress the button to adjust the length. I bought this for my 73 year old mother, an avid gardener, but this would be impossible to operate with her arthritis and a hazard with her delicate skin. Plus it's so heavy, it's a pain to use.
customer_reviews.author: vintagebarrio

customer_reviews.title: This rake is absolutely great - the way you can adjust the tongs on ...
customer_reviews.text: This rake is absolutely great - the way you can adjust the tongs on it is perfect. I used it to clean the gravel from my yard and it out did any other rake I had. I also had to clean up black walnuts that came down after the snow fall and it pulled them from the ground very easily. I would recommend this rake to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Nellis

customer_reviews.title: Nice adjustable width rake
customer_reviews.text: I had a rake like this at one time that fell apart due to many years of use and abuse. It lasted for years, so I just had to have another one. This one seems even better because of the telescoping handle. The action of the handle, the adjustable tines and the locking mechanism is very smooth. I believe with a little TLC (not left outside to rust) this rake will last a very long time as well. I love the adjustability of the width of the tines. Great for getting in the shrub beds or raking a large area. Almost makes me wish I had leaves to rake now. Well, almost, but not quite. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Too Nice to Use
customer_reviews.text: This rake could more properly be called a surgical instrument. Cool opening method and as the handle gets into position, the little extender button will let you add length to the handle. It came on time but in a busted box with no packing at all. Another tool you won't dare leave leaning up against a tree in your front yard unattended. The tines and method of attachment look to be sturdy enough for medium sized lawns, but if I had much property, I'd get a way bigger, more suitable tool. It will be just great in my back yard-garden area. If it fails me, I'll report back.
customer_reviews.author: Layton P.Top Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Love this rake!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rake. Has good quality metal and easily adjusts. The tines don't dig in. My only complaint is that the handle doesn't have a larger diameter. That seems to be happening more frequently with yard tools, a way to save money and materials in small increments, I guess. It would be great if Amazon would offer grips for yard tools that come with small diameter handles. Having said all that, I would recommend this rake, and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JAM Ovid, MI

customer_reviews.title: Super pricey, but our small car can't handle a ...
customer_reviews.text: Super pricey, but our small car can't handle a full size rake, and I need one here in Texas when we go camping, as there are always tons of branches and acorns to get out of the way. The tines can be squished together more closely, which makes it easier to rake the acorns out of the way. Now we have nice smooth ground to put our tent!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy for regular, daily use.
customer_reviews.text: I work in landscaping and thought I could use this as my every day rake to get in some tight spaces as well as regular raking, but it is too heavy to use on a regular basis. I would have to switch between rakes, and there just isn't time to be playing around like that.
customer_reviews.author: PinterPaws

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Compact
customer_reviews.text: This adjustable rake made my fall clean up very easy this year. I was able to adjust whenever I needed to get into small, tricky spots and corners. Now that the job is done, I adjust it to the smallest size and tuck it away until I need it again. I did bend one of the tines but that was my fault and note that the times aren't capped at the end so it will scratch patio stones
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: ANY WIDTH YOU NEED
customer_reviews.text: This rake can be shortened for transportation, then extended for use. My purpose was for already whacked dried weeds/grasses mixed in with berries etc. that needed to be collected and bagged. The fact that the tines can be compressed so closely worked out in my favor for collecting all the tiny pebbles/berries/grasses etc. in one swoop. And I can widen it quickly with the handy lever to scoop up tree leaves and other debris. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Casacolibri

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite tool!
customer_reviews.text: As I am traversing my large property working on different areas, the retractable feature of this rake means I can get into small spaces and also have a full size rake as needed. The handle of this rake telescopes too, so transporting it is not awkward as it can be with a regular large rake. It's a bit heavier than most rakes, but this is a small drawback considering its usefulness. It's my new favorite tool!
customer_reviews.author: Ina Saltz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent leaf or rock rake.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to clean up my campsite before I put my tent down. This thing is made like a tank and works great. It folds up to a very manageable size that fit in my car. If you extend the tines all the way out it works on leaves but if you bring it in to a little before closed it will move the rocks just as well. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get this rake.
customer_reviews.text: If you have small acorns in your yard, get this rake. We have 10 billion oak acorns the size of a nickel in our grass and normal rakes have tines that are too far apart to get the acorns out. Because this is adjustable, you can set the gap small enough to grab little acorns. I was pulling up acorns I couldn't even see because they were so far down. Also, this rake is ALL METAL so there's no plastic parts to break. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rockin Rake
customer_reviews.text: This rake is awesome! It folds down to be pretty compact but can also expand to be huge. My favorite thing is that by adjusting it you can make it fit in the corners of fencing. I can get everything raked easily by adjusting this rake. It's also very sturdy which I have not seen in metal rake before (they are usually flimsy).
customer_reviews.author: Kate F.

customer_reviews.title: They laughed at me...
customer_reviews.text: My family laughed at me when I pulled this out of my trunk on our last camping trip. "You brought a rake??" they mocked! But then I used the rake to make sure there weren't any pointy rocks that would seek to pop my extraordinarily expensive Exped MegaMat Duo. A sibling put a whole in his Thermarest pad when his kid stepped on the exact place there happened to be a sharp rock. I made it through the weekend unscathed. Booyah! Trunk rake to the rescue!
customer_reviews.author: Wheatley4President

customer_reviews.title: 👍👋
customer_reviews.text: I use these almost daily for my Tree Service they are great durable and would recommend to anyone working in the yard or garden and they can be adjusted to rack anything from gravel to leaves 🍁 or debris from trimming hedges 👍👋
customer_reviews.author: Wendell

customer_reviews.title: Nice rake, easy storage
customer_reviews.text: I like the space saving storage. My garage is a car guy's cave and don't like ugly lawn care stuff hanging off the walls. Of course that means I keep my lawn stuff in the shed, but it is on the smaller side and so the collapsing rake is a welcome addition to save space. It is sturdy just like any rake and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: You Don't Get What You Ordered
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like what I ordered. Does not adjust. Neither the rake fan nor the handle adjust. I waited two weeks for this Prime item and received a straight handled medium quality rake that is nothing like I ordered.. Now I'm left with the choice of using it, and my yard is tough shape or returning it and waiting weeks more for another.
customer_reviews.author: Coach

customer_reviews.title: A rake for any situation
customer_reviews.text: I love this type of rake. I am just a smidgen over 5' tall and most rake handles are to long. These rakes open very wide, yet when almost closed it is great for getting into tight areas. Unlike my other similar rakes, the handle of this one telescopes, making it easy for someone around 6' tall to use it easly. Again I love this concept.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Grabowski

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for camping. We just used it on 7/13/18 and it was out standing, it is well made of metal and I love how it is collapsible. All the others we made of plastic. We use this to rake our camp site before we put our tent up so we don't have sharp twigs poke through our tent floor. I recommend this rake for anyone who needs to save on space and wants quality!
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Great rake! I was really shocked out how sturdy ...
customer_reviews.text: Great rake! I was really shocked out how sturdy this rake is. I didn't expect the combs on the rake to be so rigid and strong because this rake really digs into the ground as though you're cultivating. I just needed it for tight spots in between my hedges. NOTE: I was getting ready to return it because I couldn't get the darn handle to extend. Good thing I zoomed in on the online picture. There's a button at the bottom you have to push to extend the handle and it locks in a groove. Would be nice if it came with instructions to do so.
customer_reviews.author: D C White

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: The rake that came did not meet the product specifications...not collapsible on handle portion. No long lever shown in pick with red handle...recieved a totally different rake
customer_reviews.author: When I feel like it

customer_reviews.title: wonderful rake
customer_reviews.text: makes yard work a breeze. these have held up far better than the first pair i had. They don't jam up on me and allow me to reach into tight spaces. . they are more sleeker and better in design and function than most rakes I've had. 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: fayla clark

customer_reviews.title: Love this rake!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after being suck home during COVID. I have gotten a lot of cleanup and general yard work done thanks to this lightweight rake. I had a similar version years ago that did eventually break so I then bought a traditional plastic rake which broke after two years. I also love how you can change the length of the handle and teeth for hard to reach garden spots.
customer_reviews.author: Lola B

customer_reviews.title: Still has tyne twisting problem
customer_reviews.text: I thought that perhaps in the last 10 years since I bought one of these that they might have figured out how to keep the individual tynes from twisting. Nope. But it's still useful for certain situations.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Owner

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a requirement for me!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ultimate in rakes and it is so cool looking and working, that I'm afraid to dirty it! That aside, I got it because we have white beach sand and I want to rake all the maple leaves out without taking all the sand with it! Absolutely a necessary addition to my collection of garden tools...and as my husband always says "no tool is too expensive for my wife" :)
customer_reviews.author: kjani

customer_reviews.title: Decent product. Damaged, no one will take responsibility to make good on the order.
customer_reviews.text: Rake arrived at my house I unboxed it discarded the box next day I took the wrapping off the top and the top was torn and there was rust. Tried to communicate with the seller frankly very difficult to figure out who the seller is. No one seems to want to take responsibility.
customer_reviews.author: Rancher

customer_reviews.title: Like it but for one thing
customer_reviews.text: Like it but for one thing: The plastic grip at the end of the handle falls off consistently. Any recommendations? Can It be glued? Thank you, The Old Gardner
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for delicate raking in small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite rake. I’ve had a similar version but this includes a telescopic handle. This rake is perfect for getting into closed spaces around delicate plantings. With a flick of the lever, it widens to a standard width. When collapsed, it’s a nice compact package that stores easily. Just get it. You’ll be glad you did. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Prem925

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very versatile!
customer_reviews.text: We use this rake in our lawn business and it works fantastic. It’s adjustable in the length of the handle as well as the width of the rake itself so you can easily get under and between bushes or spread it out for large debris clean up. Would buy again in a NY minute!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mulaik

customer_reviews.title: Not what was described
customer_reviews.text: The description suggests this rake collapses in TWO ways: the teeth fold up AND the handles retracts. What I got does hot have a retractable handle. So I give it two stars simply because it’s not what was advertised. But it’s still fine, so I’m not giving it only a single star.
customer_reviews.author: doebtown

customer_reviews.title: Love this adjustable rake!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only rake I use now as it is extremely easy to adjust from short & narrow to use in my perennial beds to long & wide to rake huge piles of oak leaves in the yard. I have lupus arthritis so I don't like heavy tools; this is amazingly lightweight. I will buy one of these for my 81 year old mother who is a gardening freak like me!
customer_reviews.author: Pigmy111

customer_reviews.title: Great rake, I use it for camping
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty great rake, because of how it collapses and telescopes you can use it as a narrow rake or widen it out to full size. I use this when camping to rake out the campsite, much better not tripping over twigs at night! I recommend a bag for it when traveling, as the tines can catch and snag on everything.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: The overall design and steel tube construction of this rake is very solid. But is is REALLY heavy ... and most of that weight is at the far end where the moving mechanism is. I would get a sore arm if I had to use it for more than a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: This gadget is great. I have two large rakes that work well ...
customer_reviews.text: This gadget is great. I have two large rakes that work well for the yard but they don't work at all in tight places, which I have plenty of because of plants, trees, and a rock wall. Being able to easily change the width of the rake is a feature that I really like and use often.
customer_reviews.author: PDX-TBH

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am skeptical about buying any rake but this product is beyond perfect for me. I have alot of gardening and my larger rake with the wooden handle always gives me blisters. So i decided to give this a try and im so glad i did. Ive been using it all spring so far and no blisters plus its held up great. I do hose it off after every use to keep it new.
customer_reviews.author: SherriD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I have a very old adjustable rake that finally was used so much it won't hold the adjustment. This new one has an excellent adjustment hold and it is collapsible to about half size. I use it between planting and in window wells.
customer_reviews.author: Sadly wiser

customer_reviews.title: the more powerful reason to purchase a second was so during yard work BOTH of us could use our favorite rake at the same time
customer_reviews.text: We have about a 15 year old (identical) version of this rake and while the old one has some misaligned and bent tangs, the more powerful reason to purchase a second was so during yard work BOTH of us could use our favorite rake at the same time. Nice to have a rake that quickly adjusts from 18" wide to 4 or 5 inches back to 18" almost instantaneously to get between trunks, etc....
customer_reviews.author: Anthony K. MacKay

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this rake. My dad bought me one years ago, and through use I eventually wore it out. I bought another exactly the same because it is so helpful. I live in Arizona and I have the normal desert landscape with decorative boulders. I can size the rake for the areas being cleaned and it just works wonders. It also doubles as sort of a leave dust pan for picking up the piles. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: gerontiuscotton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this rake! Sturdy and adjustable. So tired of those flimsy plastic rakes! Glad we found this one!!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I broke my husbands original telescoping rake. We loved this style because you could change the width of the tines according to the space you were working in. We had issues getting a regular rake in between the hot tub and the fence to get all the leaves from the fall. I came across this rake and was very pleased! The only difference from our original was that the handle was not telescoping on the old one. I do like the new feature as it save storage space. I would recommend this rake!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh yeah - so I needed a fan rake to clean up leaves in my yard, it didn’t need to be overly strong and the colapseable nature of this one was just what the doctor ordered. If you need something heavy duty then you probably don’t want to use a fan rake anyway - but this one does what I need - and didn’t fall to pieces. Overall I am happy with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley S.

customer_reviews.title: Smart Telescopic Rake Design
customer_reviews.text: Goodness gracious, what a well designed rake this is. Very high quality. A very smartly designed rake with telescopic capabilities. I'll be using this rake from spring to early fall. For anyone needing to store tools in small spaces, this rake is a tool you need to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: overenthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Telescoping function doesn't really work after a season
customer_reviews.text: After a few uses and maybe a couple drops last year, the telescoping function doesn't really work anymore. Mostly bought this to save space in the garage, though, so it's still mostly fine for my uses. If you're careful you might get more mileage out of yours, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great rake!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a rake like this 20 years ago, used it till it fell apart. Ordered this one, great! Will be adding some cushioning to the handle to make it not slip in my hands and make holding more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this little rake for our camper!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! When we got to campgrounds that had lots of rocks or just needed some smoothing, this compact, strong little rake was perfect! Easy to expand, easy to collapse when I'm finished. Fits nicely in the exterior storage space. Great little product!
customer_reviews.author: SueLars

customer_reviews.title: Well built and saves space!
customer_reviews.text: Rake is made well, seems solid. Really like that it folds down to not take up very much space. Used several times with no real issues. I would prefer that it be a little longer, I have a tendency to bend over too much when using. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: I got this because I don't need to rake leaves
customer_reviews.text: I live. In a condo, so most yard is taken care of. But sometimes need to smooth mulch or clean up stuff from my flowers. So I got this handy dandy, and compact rake for my humble needs and it stores well in garage
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mullarkey

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous garden tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest little rake out there. I love it's snazzy design and how you can change the width mid-job for those tricky areas with wide then suddenly narrow spots. A keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Nike

customer_reviews.title: Great Rake!
customer_reviews.text: This rake is awesome! The ability to spread and narrow the tines at the end allows for easy raking between tight spaces. The rake is also very lightweight, and the locking mechanism to keep the tines at the desired width holds well.
customer_reviews.author: William W.

customer_reviews.title: Fall cleanup
customer_reviews.text: I've had telescoping rakes before but this one is the best one I've had. The rake is very sturdy and the telescoping action is smooth and easy to move in and out. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great size and versatility
customer_reviews.text: Great size and versatility. I manage several rental properties with small gardens. This fits in the small trunk of my car, can be made into a small flare to fit between bushes and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessse D

customer_reviews.title: This thing kinda sucks..
customer_reviews.text: This thing kinda sucks... I mean, I like that its portable and we can bring it camping, but you cant really rely on it to do rugged yard work. Its way too flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Boog

customer_reviews.title: Great rake
customer_reviews.text: I just received this rake. I like the ease of adjustability. It’s a little heavier than a regular rake due to the mechanism that makes it adjustable, as well as it just feeling sturdier, but it’s worth it. Easy to use - great rake. I gave it 4 stars only because of the increased weight.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Great Rake
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother for mother’s day. She loves gardening and need a new rake. She loves the different configurations this thing has and is totally ecstatic about it. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great rake!!
customer_reviews.text: With the height adjustment of this, my 9 year old was able to rake more efficiently because it was not so big. It works great and it adjusts to a very small size. I love this rake!
customer_reviews.author: Raych

customer_reviews.title: VERY HANDY RAKE!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this rake a five-star rating if the handle was at least 6 inches longer. Its adjustability, both in handle length and tine widths, make it perfect for raking around ornamentals, trees whose branches nearly reach the ground and around the edges of flower beds. It's one of those tools that should be in every single family residence that has a yard big enough to require raking at different times during the year.
customer_reviews.author: L. H. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: My mom had one from many years ago and my husband used it to get weeds off the lake bottom and he broke it. I got 2 more, one for mom and one for me. They are awesome and easy to store. They work great between bushes because you can make it narrow. Just don't rake a lake with it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Handle is a little short
customer_reviews.text: This rake is very well made and I'm very pleased with how it performs. my only quibble would be the handle could be a two or three inches longer. I'm 6'2" but this is only a minor gripe.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lundstrom

customer_reviews.title: WD40 the handle!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you spray telescoping handle with WD40 if it gets wet AT ALL. Mine got put away wet apparently and it was almost impossible to get the handle to extend due to corrosion.
customer_reviews.author: Steve J

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like it, but it sticks when trying to open ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like it, but it sticks when trying to open or close the rake part. Very frustrating. I am also afraid I will get hurt.used only once. Well most likely return
customer_reviews.author: MeReynolds

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Love the adjustable handle. That wasn't available on the one I bought 15 years ago. Hope this one lasts as long.
customer_reviews.author: Anita O

customer_reviews.title: Not made for stronger people.
customer_reviews.text: The metal telescopic handle bends with vigorous sweeping and doesn’t return to the original shape. This prevents it from having the ability to telescope back to the storage position. This rake is not designed for professional use or for strong people.
customer_reviews.author: nlettsome

customer_reviews.title: Nothing heavy duty about this rake
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of the rake but any light use at all bends the handle making it impossible to retract: forget about raking a yard. The only thing I'm able to use the rake for is picking up loose grass after weed eating. I'm surprised this received good reviews and wonder if they may be fake.
customer_reviews.author: Nishele

customer_reviews.title: wife loves it we had one in Kauai couldnt find ...
customer_reviews.text: wife loves it we had one in Kauai couldnt find one locally so ordered it with prime and came in few days its perfect
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: awesome folding rake
customer_reviews.text: Love this folding rake - it saves time and money - great price!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Very good design !
customer_reviews.text: Very good design! Only complain is the steel hand holder , very slippery. But this problem solved when I use it with my gloves .
customer_reviews.author: Dolce, Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very handy rake.
customer_reviews.text: I especially liked that the tines were far enough apart that leaves and limbs are not as prone to getting caught in the rake.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B. Gravely

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: The first time using this was to clean up a bunch of blown down tree branches. The adjustment part let’s you stiffen up the ends and it worked wonders.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Poor balance
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine, but has poor balance: The handle really is way too light weight for the heft of the rake mechanism and tines.
customer_reviews.author: M. McCaleb

customer_reviews.title: Best rake ever.
customer_reviews.text: Great for getting into and around bushes. Then expand to rake the yard. Very sturdy. It was a bit heavier than expected but that may be good in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: KLHS

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. I have a narrow garden so the ability ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect . I have a narrow garden so the ability to change the width of this rake is ideal. Not flimsy very sturdy. Works really well . It’s fully metal but I left outside for weeks and didn’t Rust.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Smith

customer_reviews.title: Wirth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this rake. The versatility of changing the breadth of the span makes it grear for narrow plant beds as well as for wide sweeps for lawns.
customer_reviews.author: V. Alston

customer_reviews.title: Easy, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, takes very little room to store. My 19 month old was able to change it to different sizes, that's how easy it was. The lock into place and it's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Williams

customer_reviews.title: I really like this rake
customer_reviews.text: I really like this rake, stores much easier in our tiny shed and is sturdy enough to get the job done. We use it every week, no problems with it st all.
customer_reviews.author: SaltyMango

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Compact
customer_reviews.text: This rake is a replacement for one that broke because it had plastic parts in the adjusting mechanism. This one is ALL metal plus it is colapsible which is a great added feature.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Crocker

customer_reviews.title: Robust Handy three in one rake
customer_reviews.text: Used primarily for taking leaves in the front and back yard. This works very well and I like it’s three different settings.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jag-Nathan

customer_reviews.title: CAREFUL! NOT WORTH BUYING
customer_reviews.text: It broke after 2nd time using it. It's only good to wrake basic leaves. Worthless and itll brake if you wrake some of the ground with grass
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: compact and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I only got to use this twice before snow fell, but it did its job. Its nice to telescope down and you can just hang it on a peg. It is very light weight to the point of feeling flimsy, however it still raked up the leaves easily. I have no complaints but have only used it twice.
customer_reviews.author: stilljojo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I do volunteer trail work and I needed something that was collapsible and lightweight. These are collapsible and lightweight, but they fell apart in the first use. Totally worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Wanagel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy and the way you can adjust it is perfect for any situation. Very compact for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Go Blue

customer_reviews.title: Does not match the description.
customer_reviews.text: The rake does not have a telescopic handle. when folded 49 "this is not 37 at all," as written in the description. Not made firmly, such a price is too expensive for a product of this quality.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful rake - better than I could have expected or hoped. Gets into narrow /challenging spots. very happy with this rake
customer_reviews.author: Tina Amberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect everyday rake!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lightweight rake to do basic raking jobs! Easy to expand fan and pole. Sturdy, folds up small. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Great rake for many uses.
customer_reviews.text: Perfict rake for getting into tight places, removes thach well. Is made with sturdy construction. We use it for trail work as well to remove organic mater from "water bars" on the trails.Compacts for easy packing in our back packs. It is a bit heavy but needs to be to heavy trail work on wet leaves etc.
customer_reviews.author: William Connors

customer_reviews.title: Alternate uses for a rake
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because beaches in South Florida always seem to be covered in seaweed or other substances. This rake fits well in my backpack and allows me to clean of my little patch of sand without too much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: The Ops Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good rake
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for raking oak leaves and pine needles without hurting the grass.
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerOfAllTheThings

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rake!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rake!!! So easy to make small or big. Gets to the smallest of areas around plants and hard to reach areas.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent rake
customer_reviews.text: This rake is great for raking pine needles. I had another one that was similar but the clamp was plastic and broke. This one has a metal clamp and appears to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: 😊Happy Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really good in terms of use, and stands up to the Big Foot type of Pressure I apply when Raking.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay extended
customer_reviews.text: It's a great concept but it rake doesn't stay extended due to it's sub par latching system.
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for clearing campsites
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rake for clearing campsites of debris. It is much sturdier than I expected, and easily fits into my pack, or kayak for travel. I have only used it once, but found it very functional. both for the camp site, and for working in the garden clearing leaves from tight places.
customer_reviews.author: Geoweb

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy and well made. Time will tell if it holds up or not but at least it doesn't seem cheap or flimsy which is what I feared initially.
customer_reviews.author: Darkbreeze

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this for any serious gardener
customer_reviews.text: This is the one and only rake you will ever need for yard cleanup! The ability to make the prongs closer together, makes it easier to pick up loads of leaves with a dustpan. The prongs are heavy steel and resist bending or distortion. Highly recommend this for any serious gardener!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: so nice to have a super compact rake
customer_reviews.text: so nice to have a super compact rake, easy to put away. A tinge on the heavy side because it's solid sturdy metal construction.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Good rake for camping
customer_reviews.text: It’s good! Pretty light, stores small, extends easily and stays open while in use. Feels sturdy, well made. I’ve use it on four camping trips, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Z.

product_meta.title: Professional EZ Travel Collection Adjustable Telescopic Folding Rake, Expandable Rake for Gardens, Flower Beds, Window Wells, and More
product_meta.description: Durable. Comfortable. Lightweight. With the EZ Travel Telescopic All-Purpose Rake, tidying up flower beds and clearing a garden’s worth of leaves is easier than ever. This high-quality all-purpose rake adjusts in two ways, telescoping from 37 inches to 68 inches and adjusting from 7.5 to 21.75 inches for all your raking needs. This rake is built to last for years and works for a variety of projects. Whether you’re cultivating a flower patch or clearing weeds, this rake will get the job done with ease. Protect your plants and navigate small spaces easily with EZ Travel. Keep your yard and garden beautiful with a rake you can trust!
feature_bullets: EXPANDS AND ADJUSTS - Garden maintenance is a breeze with the Professional EZ Travel Telescopic all-purpose rake! Perfect for clearing leaves or debris, this rake is also perfect for tight spaces. Easily adjust the fan head and telescoping handle to find the perfect fit for any yard project.

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL - Great for working under hedges and in flower beds, the versatility of this rake is unmatched. The smaller head allows you to rake in between perennials without damaging the plants. It is ideal for raking through window wells, under hard to reach spaces, and in the middle of dense flower patches.

ERGONOMIC HANDLE - Yard work might not be everyone’s idea of fun, but you don’t have to be uncomfortable while you rake. The Professional EZ Travel Collection telescopic rake is comfortable and durable thanks to our easy-grip, rubberized handle.

GREAT FOR HEAVY LIFTING - Strong and lightweight, this rake is made from long-lasting aluminum alloy. The adjustable fan folds to a tighter profile, strengthening the tines and lightening large loads.
DIMENSIONS: The handle telescopes from 37 inches to 68 inches for all your raking needs. The tough steel tines adjust from 7.5 inches to 21.75 inches wide.
